content.rendered:
Finding the right manufacturer to produce your OEM camera is not an easy task. OEM is an Original Equipment Manufacturer, in which Adiance is the leading manufacturing and servicing Provider Company. There is a sea of suppliers that will resell you whatever you need, but we here provide you with everything blended with OEM technology.

The manufacturing of cameras is just not about putting your brand on a product but also comes up with full customization according to your requirements and needs. While doing this, we also take care of customer’s needs and provide customers with customized packaging, with good quality assurance.

Why Adiance?

  • Follows a stable and persistent growth
  • Cutting edge anomaly detection
  • Real time video streaming
  • Any hardware can be blended with cloud storage
  • Futuristic provisioning system
  • Ultra-modern technology
